modifier_biology_research_10pc.text: Empire gains Rift Samples modifier: {{biology}} +10% Biology Research for 5-10 years

modifier_biology_research_20pc.text: Empire gains Rift Samples modifier: {{biology}} +20% Biology Research for 10 years

modifier_physics_research_10pc_10y.text: Empire gains {{physics}} +10% Physics Research for 10 years

modifier_vortex_fuel.text: Vortex Fuel modifier: {{energy}} +10% Energy for 10 years

restoring_the_balance_modifier.text: Restoring the Balance modifier: {{energy}} +10% Energy production for 6 years

extra_dimensional_spores_modifier.text: Extra Dimensional Spores modifier: {{exotic_gases}} +25% Exotic Gases

modifier_colonization_drones.text: Colonization Drones modifier: +25% Colony Development and Blocker Clearing Speed

modifier_procedural_space.text: Empire gains Procedural Space modifier: +1 Max Districts, +1 Max Corporate Buildings in Branch Offices

modifier_formula_pink.text: Formula Pink modifier: +20 opinion (non-robotic/lithoid/toxoid), +10% army health, -50% morale damage taken to armies

zroni_storm_modifier.text: Zroni Insight Storm Safeguard modifier: -50% negative effects of space storms

foreign_consciousness_mod.text: Empire gains Foreign Consciousness modifier: {{research}} +5% to all research

progress_biology_10pc.text: 10% progress towards a random {{biology}} Biology technology

progress_biology_15pc.text: 15% progress towards a random {{biology}} Biology technology

progress_biology_25pc.text: 25% progress towards a random {{biology}} Biology technology

progress_computing_20pc.text: 20% progress towards a random {{computing}} Computing technology

progress_computing_25pc.text: 25% progress towards a random {{computing}} Computing technology

progress_field_manipulation_25pc.text: 25% progress towards a random {{field_manipulation}} Field Manipulation technology

progress_particles_25pc.text: 25% progress towards a random {{particles}} Particles technology

progress_particles_75pc.text: 75% progress towards a random {{particles}} Particles technology

progress_psionics_75pc.text: 75% progress towards a random {{psionics}} Psionics technology

research_random_military_25pc.text: 25% progress towards a random {{military_theory}} Military Theory technology

deposit_10_physics_rift.text: Adds a {{physics}} 10 Physics Research deposit to the rift

deposit_10_society_rift.text: Adds a {{society}} 10 Society Research deposit to the rift

deposit_10_unity_rift.text: Adds a {{unity}} 10 Unity deposit to the rift

deposit_society_15_10y.text: Adds a {{society}} 15 Society Research deposit on the astral rift (removed after 10 years)

deposit_25_society_rift.text: Adds a {{society}} 25 Society Research deposit on the Astral Rift

physics_engineering_deposit.text: Adds a deposit: {{physics}} 25 Physics and {{engineering}} 25 Engineering (removed after 10 years)

convert_scientist_envoy.text: Option to convert the scientist into an {{envoy}} envoy (Reconverted Leader: +1 available envoys)

edict_astral_cloaking.text: Unlocks Astral Cloaking edict (+1 cloaking strength)

event_dust_to_dust.text: After 2-4 years, triggers the Dust to Dust event: gives {{society}} Society Research and {{engineering}} Engineering Research, removes the {{society}} Society Research deposit from the Rift

fractal_seed_planetary_decision_3.text: Gain 3 Fractal Seed planetary decisions (+1 building slot)

fractal_seed_planetary_decision_9.text: Gain 9 Fractal Seed planetary decisions (+1 building slot)

incubate_wind_creatures_decision.text: Unlocks Incubate Wind Creatures decision on 3 planets (+5 max generator districts each)

intentional_tidal_locking_decision.text: Unlocks the Intentional Tidal Locking planetary decision (reduces max agriculture/mining districts by 3, enables Expand Dayside Infrastructure: {{energy}} +30% Energy from jobs)

paragon_oakenstalk.text: An option to recruit the Paragon Oakenstalk

planet_decision_rockworm_hive.text: Unlocks single use Rockworm Hive planetary decision ({{minerals}} +20% minerals from jobs, +5 max mining districts)

recruit_flamestorm_troopers.text: Unlocks the ability to recruit Flamestorm Troopers

recruit_warpling_armies.text: Unlocks the ability to recruit Warpling Armies

relic_ever_spinning_top.text: Gain the Ever Spinning Top relic

research_option_transgenic_crops.text: Unlocks the Transgenic Crops research option

shallow_impact_decision.text: Unlocks single use Display Microplanet Husk decision (+10 Stability, -30 Crime)

tech_celestial_tear.text: Unlocks Celestial Tear relic (+5% habitability on A/B/F/G star planets, {{astral_threads}} 1250 Astral Threads active use)

tech_quantum_upgrade.text: Next-tier Quantum Firewall or Decryption tech, else a random {{computing}} Computing tech

leader_trait_spark_of_genius.text: Scientist gains the Spark of Genius trait

scientist_foreign_consciousness_traits.text: Scientist gains Resilience II, Planar Theorist, Psychic, Riftwalker, and Foreign Consciousness traits

scientist_partially_digested.text: Scientist gains the Partially Digested trait and a new portrait

scientist_psionic_foreign_consciousness_.text: Scientist gains Resilience, Planar Theorist, and Foreign Consciousness traits

scientist_returns_plantoid.text: Scientist returns as a plantoid leader after 5 years

scientist_rift_warped.text: Scientist goes missing and returns in 5-7 years with the Rift Warped Trait and Expertise: Propulsion I or Expertise: Voidcraft I (if it already has Propulsion I)

scientist_rift_warped_advisor.text: Scientist disappears for five years and returns with Rift Warped + one of Spark of Genius / Perfectionist / Roamer traits

scientist_rift_warped_corridors.text: Scientist returns in 5 years with Rift Warped and either Expertise: Materials I or Expertise: Particles I

scientist_rift_warped_replacement.text: In 1 year, receive a new Level 6 Scientist with Rift Warped trait and random specialization

scientist_tower_species.text: Gain a Scientist of The Tower's species with Society Focus and Increased Lifespan traits in one year

specimen_cleaning_drone.text: Repurposed Cleaning Drone specimen: +25% Planetary Build Speed

trait_psychic_gain.text: Leader gains the Psychic trait if they have Latent Psionic

trait_sanitary_drone_assistant.text: Scientist gains the Sanitary Drone Assistant trait

baol_pops_3.text: 3 Baol Pops are created on a random planet

basic_resource_jobs_05.text: {{food}} +0.5 Food from Farmers (Biological) / {{minerals}} +0.5 Minerals from Miners ({{lithoid}} Lithoid) / {{energy}} +0.5 Energy from Technicians ({{machine}} Machine)

scientist_rift_warped_lv3.text: Gain a level 3 Scientist with the Rift Warped Trait

commander_rift_warped_lv3.text: Gain a level 3 Commander with the Rift Warped Trait

official_rift_warped_lv3.text: Gain a level 3 Official with the Rift Warped Trait

official_unaging_50.text: Gain an Official with age 50, unable to receive negative traits

trait_strong.text: Give the new species the Strong trait

trait_natural_intellectuals.text: Give the new species the Natural Intellectuals trait

trait_proles.text: Give the new species the Proles trait

trait_ingenious.text: Give the new species the Ingenious trait

trait_conservative.text: Give the new species the Conservative trait

trait_starborn.text: Give the new species the Starborn trait

pop_new_species.text: On a random colony, one new {{pop}} pop is created from the new species. The new species' climate preference will match the colony

genesis_core_specimen.text: Genesis Core specimen: +6% Organic Pop Assembly Speed

genesis_insight.text: Gains empire modifier Genesis Insight: {{society}} +5% Society Research

governing_ethics_attraction_50pc_10y.text: Gains empire modifier Governing Ethics Attraction +50% for 10 years

establish_communications_mirror_empire.text: Establishes communications with the Mirror Empire

fractured_ambassadors.text: Gains empire modifier Fractured Ambassadors: +10% Diplomatic Weight, +20 Opinion with non-Gestalt empires

a_star_is_born_modifier_10y.text: Gains empire modifier A Star is Born: {{physics}} +10% Physics Research for 10 years

tech_physics_wormhole_stabilization_or_p.text: Unlocks Wormhole Stabilization if possible or receive 50% progress towards a random {{particles}} Particles technology

revolutionary_medigel_modifier.text: Gains empire modifier Revolutionary Medigel: +50% output from Medical Workers

tech_industry_robotics_progress_10pc.text: Receive 10% progress towards a random {{industry}} Robotics technology

edict_spontaneous_crystallization.text: Gain the Spontaneous Crystallization edict: convert {{minerals}} 1% Mineral output into {{rare_crystals}} Rare Crystals

strange_wormhole_spawn.text: Spawns the Strange Wormhole giving access to the azilash system
